title: Anything Can Be a Dance
lyrics:
[Intro: Olivia Rodrigo, 
Madison Hu
 & 
Both
]
Do ya ever hear music
But don't know how to get movin'? Haha
There's really nothin' to it
[Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & 
Madison Hu
]
'Cause
 anything can be a dance
No matter how crazy, follow along if you can
'Cause anything can be a, anything can be a dance
Look how we get down (
Ow
)
Bust a move, yeah, we do it like that
Anything can be a dance, dance, dance
[Verse 1: Olivia Rodrigo & 
Madison Hu
]
Do the shoppin' cart
Ha, grab the milk right off the shelf
Do the earwax cleaner
If ya can't think of anything else
Do the swipe ya phone, then the tangled hair comb
Now the eat some scrambled eggs
Do the wheelbarrow
The one where you go grab ya best friend by the legs
[Chorus: Madison Hu & 
Olivia Rodrigo
]
'Cause anything can be a dance
No matter how crazy, follow along if you can
'Cause anything can be a, anything can be a dance
Look how we get down (
Ow
)
Bust a move, yeah, we do it like that
Anything can be a—

[Verse 2: Madison Hu]
Do the walk over there, just go on and move your feet
Do the lean and whisper, "Hey, you okay?"
Just keep snappin' to the beat
Do the lift her up, do the human crutch
Do the—ah, so heavy
Do the crazy wobble, imagination's all you need, woah!
[Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & 
Madison Hu
]
'Cause
 anything can be a dance
No matter how crazy, follow along if you can
'Cause anything can be a, anything can be a dance
Look how we get down (
Ow
)
Bust a move, yeah, we do it like that
Anything can be a dance, dance, dance
